title: Pope Francis Faces Tests on Abortion, Gay Rights
content:
1. Pope Francis Faces Tests on Abortion, Gay Rights  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Vatican orders all employees to get vaccine or submit to testing  Axios
  3. Francis is set to open a worldwide synod process. US dioceses don't seem prepared.  National Catholic Reporter
  4. Pope at Audience: Power of grace must lead to works of mercy  Vatican News
  5. Pope Francis: My spirituality comes directly from Vatican II  America Magazine
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
